name: TACTICAL
description:
TACTICAL is a punishing combination of puzzle and top-down shooter. You have one objective: eliminate all of the security robots. The catch is that you must not be discovered and only shots to the back will be effective.The Gameplay
  • Study patrol patterns and formulate your plan of attack.
  • Sneak through the level unseen as you pick off your targets.
  • Eliminate enemies in tactical locations to lure your next target into position.
Key Features
  • 40 Unique levels.
  • Each chapter adds new mechanics.
  • Levels get progressively more challenging as you complete them.
  • Culminating in a series of epic multi-part levels that will test all the skills you have developed.
  • Earn in-game trophies by completing levels within the specified times.
  • See your Global Ranking for each level.
  • 10 Steam Achievements to unlock.
